article.title: Special Operations Awards $68 Million Data Center Services Contract
article.author: George Seffers
article.text: HP Enterprise Services Limited Liability Company, Herndon, Virginia, is being awarded a single, 4-year, $68 million contract for data center services in support of U.S. Special Operations Command (USSOCOM).Â Under the Special Operations Forces information technology enterprise contracts, data center services contract, the selected contractor will provide enterprise-wide data center management support services to manage USSOCOM's global enterprise information technology server and storage computing environment providing coverage for USSOCOM headquarters, all component commands, and subordinate commands.
